blogPost.title: What are your top 5 tips for founders/entrepreneurs? Answer by @KunalLunawat, GP & Co-founder at @AgyaVentures. https://t.co/YSGhApN4oJ https://t.co/4iImskoq3z
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 創業者/起業家のためのトップ5のヒントは何ですか？Answer by @KunalLunawat, GP & Co-founder at @AgyaVentures. https://t.co/YSGhApN4oJ https://t.co/4iImskoq3z
您对创始人/企业家的五大建议是什么？回答者：@KunalLunawat，GP & @AgyaVentures的联合创始人。https://t.co/YSGhApN4oJ https://t.co/4iImskoq3z
您對創始人/企業家的五大建議是什麼？回答者：@KunalLunawat，GP & @AgyaVentures的聯合創始人。https://t.co/YSGhApN4oJ https://t.co/4iImskoq3z

previous.title: What are the biggest obstacles you see when it comes to human resources post-pandemic? Answer by @Karalyg, Senior HR Law Analyst. https://t.co/hc90RCoBhj https://t.co/4K08OcBky7

localize.full_text: パンデミック後の人的資源に関して、最大の障害は何でしょうか？Answer by @Karalyg, Senior HR Law Analyst. https://t.co/hc90RCoBhj https://t.co/4K08OcBky7
谈到大流行病后的人力资源，你认为最大的障碍是什么？回答者：@Karalyg，高级人力资源法律分析师。https://t.co/hc90RCoBhj https://t.co/4K08OcBky7
談到大流行病後的人力資源，你認爲最大的障礙是什麼？回答者：@Karalyg，高級人力資源法律分析師。https://t.co/hc90RCoBhj https://t.co/4K08OcBky7

next.title: What are your top 5 tips for creating values for remote teams? Answer by Marjorie Janiewicz (@Toucas), Senior Vice President, HackerOne. https://t.co/kiPdtjefqp https://t.co/w2tSNaBaDS

localize.full_text: リモートチームの価値観を生み出すためのトップ5のヒントを教えてください。回答者： Marjorie Janiewicz (@Toucas), Senior Vice President, HackerOne. https://t.co/kiPdtjefqp https://t.co/w2tSNaBaDS
您为远程团队创造价值的5大技巧是什么？HackerOne高级副总裁Marjorie Janiewicz（@Toucas）的回答。https://t.co/kiPdtjefqp https://t.co/w2tSNaBaDS
您爲遠程團隊創造價值的5大技巧是什麼？HackerOne高級副總裁Marjorie Janiewicz（@Toucas）的回答。https://t.co/kiPdtjefqp https://t.co/w2tSNaBaDS
